chat.content:
```coq
intros m.
induction m using fmap_ind.
- left. unfold planar. simpl. reflexivity.
- destruct IHm as [H | H].
  + left. unfold planar. simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity.
  + right. unfold planar. simpl. intro H0. apply H. rewrite <- H0. reflexivity.
- destruct IHm as [H | H].
  + left. unfold planar. simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity.
  + right. unfold planar. simpl. intro H0. apply H. rewrite <- H0. reflexivity.
Qed.

original: intros m. induction m using fmap_ind. - left. unfold planar. simpl. reflexivity. - destruct IHm as [H | H]. + left. unfold planar. simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity. + right. unfold planar. simpl. intro H0. apply H. rewrite <- H0. reflexivity. - destruct IHm as [H | H]. + left. unfold planar. simpl. rewrite H. reflexivity. + right. unfold planar. simpl. intro H0. apply H. rewrite <- H0. reflexivity.
